name: Build a Toy 0.01
description:
PinBox

Build your own levels and parcours in this bitsy sandbox game!

Credits

Game Art: Justin

Programming: Aleks/Maria

This prototype was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Build a toy (first)"  (WinterSemester 2021/22)
